Name: Roll Around
Description: If the Bear is awake, deal 1 damage to each enemy.

Name: Knock Over
Description:
Deal 1 damage to one or two enemies.
Rotate one hero card on your field or on your partner's field.

Name: Mark Territory
Description:
Rotate two hero cards on your field.
Draw one card from your deck.

Name: Bear Claw
Description: Deal 2 damage to one enemy. If the Bear is awake, deal 4 damage instead.

Name: Resounding Roar
Description:
If the Bear is awake, deal 3 damage to each enemy.
Otherwise, remove 5 ⏳ and forage.
